items.sentence: Tom has been out of the office for a couple weeks.
Tom has been sitting there for a really long time.
I don\'t think I need to tell Tom about our plans.
This is one of the most dangerous places on earth.
This is the pair of sunglasses I bought in Boston.
This kind of weather makes me want to stay inside.
Please clean up this room before everyone arrives.
It\'s a shame Tom couldn\'t make it to your party.
How am I going to get this done without your help?
How are you coming along with your French lessons?
How can something so simple become so complicated?
How can we reduce the number of highway accidents?
I think you know that Tom isn\'t going to do that.
None of you have any idea what I\'ve been through.
Tom would have eaten more if he hadn\'t been sick.
Would you like me to order the same thing for you?
Tom and Mary were among the ones who didn\'t come.
We plan to stay open until we\'ve sold everything.
Tom isn\'t the kind of person I want to deal with.
You\'re supposed to do that tomorrow, aren\'t you?
